name: Duck Pond-ering
description:
Source code at https://github.com/RichTeaMan/duck-game, with a hosted version at https://richteaman.github.io/duck-game/.

A pond with some hungry and slightly melancholy ducks. Built for Untitled Game Jam.

Instructions for your pond:

  • Press on the water to feed the ducks.
  • Press on the nest for a duck to lay eggs.
  • Press on a duck for duck facts.

This game is pond simulator. Ducks swim about, looking for food, and nesting opportunities. Calling this game is a bit of a stretch, but more of a prototype of an isometric web game with a 3D asset development pipeline.

I wasn't really sure what to do the theme of the ducks, but I knew I wanted to play with some isometric projections. So I made a duck model and a basic map and hoped the game would arrive in the process. Unforuntately, I don't think it did, but given more time I think there's something here. I'd like to add some zycoon dynamics and have bread as a currency. If I had a few more days I'd have implemented human pond visitors that would throw bread, and then added optional clothing accessories to ducks could would to further impress for more bread.
